title: After The Last
original_name: NARUTO–ナルト–特別番外編~After THE LAST~,
sinopse:
By checking Sai's books about proper human interaction, Naruto learns that men are supposed to pay for everything on a date. When he takes Hinata out to a restaurant, however, he is intimidated by how expensive the food is.

(Source: Naruto Wikipedia)
